case.title: Click on link redirect User to Home page
Click on link redirect User to Sign In page
Click on link redirect User to Sign Up page
Click on link redirect User to User's profile
Click on link redirect User to Article page
Check if Unauthorized user can click on [Like]
User can search for information with pagination
User can select articles by tag
Click on link redirect User to GitHub
Click on link redirect User to Sign up page
User can log in with already registered username in DB
"Username" field is no register sensitive
User can’t sign in with empty "Username" field
User can input text in "Username" field
User can copy text in "Username" field
User can paste text in "Username" field
If Password match with already registered Username in DB user can Log in
User can’t log in with empty “Password” field
Password field must have a mask
User can paste text in “Password” field
If Email and Password are match, click on [Sign in] user log in into account
Click on link redirect User to "Sign in" page
User can create Username with Latin characters in range from 4 to 36
User can create new Username that contain special symbols ("-", "_")
User can't create Username that contain less than 4 symbols
User can't create Username that contain more than 36 symbols
User can't create Username that contain non-Latin alphabet letters
“Username” field is no register sensitive
“Username” field is required to register new user (can't be blank)
User can't create new account with already registered username
User can't create new account with already registered email in DB
User's email format must be [name]@[domain].[top-domain]
"Email" field is required to register new user (can't be blank)
New user's email can contain special symbols (".", "_", "+")
New user's email can contain integers
New user's email can't contain non-Latin letters
User’s new password must contain at least one symbol, one integer, capital letter in range from 4 to 30 symbols
“Password” field is required to register new user (can’t be blank)
User can’t create Password shorter than 4 symbols
User can’t create Password longer than 30 symbols
User can't create Password that contain only symbols
User can’t create Password that contain only integers
User can’t create Password that contain only letters
“Password” field must have a mask
If passwords are match User can create new account
Notification if password doesn't match
If all field are fill in, click [Sign in] will create new User
Check if Unauthorized user can click [Follow]
User can search for information with pagination
User can search for information with pagination
Click on link redirect User to "Sign in" page
Click on link redirect User to "Sign up" page
Click on link redirect User to Home page
Click on link redirect User to "New Post" page
Click on link redirect User to "Settigs"
Click on link redirect User to User's profile page
Сheck if articles are updated in order
Click on link redirect User to article page
User can search for information with pagination
Click on link redirect User to GitHub
“Article title” field can’t be empty
“Article title” field can’t be shorter than 5 symbols
“Article title” field can be longer than 240 symbols
User can create new article with already published title
Title of article can’t begin with Space
Title of article can’t be ended with Space
Title of article can’t contain more than one Spaces between symbols
Notification appears if user left field blank empty or input less than 5 symbols
User can create new Article with input letters
User can create new Article with input numbers
User can create new Article with input special characters
User can create new Article using Space between symbols
“What’s this article about?” field can’t be empty
Field can’t contain less than 10 symbols
Field can’t contain more than 240 symbols
Field can contain letters, numbers, special characters
User can use Space only between symbols
“Write your article (in markdown)” field can’t be empty
Field can’t contain less than 20 symbols
Field can’t contain more than 9000 symbols
Field doesn’t have attachments options
User can change size of text box, by drag right corner up or down
Field can contain letters, numbers, special characters
Notification appear if user left field empty
User can use Space only between symbols
User can create new article with tags
User can create new article without tags
Tag’s name can contain less than 2 symbols
Tag’s name can’t contain more than 30 symbols
User can add from 1 to 10 tags to his article
User can’t add more than 10 tags to his article
User can add url picture
User can change nickname
User can add new information to "Short Bio" field
User can change information to "Short Bio" field
User can change email
User can change password
New information is updated after click on [Update Setting]
After click on [Or Click here to logout] user is log out
Clicking on "Avatar" navigate to user's profile
Clicking on "Nickname" navigate to user's profile
Clicking on [Edit Profile Settings] navigate to "Settings"
Check if user can search for information with pagination
Clicking on Username redirects to User profile page
Clicking on User’s avatar redirects to User profile page
Clicking on [Edit Article] redirects to Edit Post page
User can delete own article by click on [Delete Article]
User can add a comment to article which contain at least on symbol after click on [Post comment]
User can’t add a comment to article which has no symbols
User can’t add a comment to article which has more than 240 symbols
User can change size of text box, by drag right corner up or down
User can delete his own comment by click on “Trash bin” icon
Click on [Edit Article] redirect user to Edit article page
Non authorized or authorized non authors of article users can get to page by using link
User can click on the “Edit article” button without any changes added
User can change name of Article Title
User can change information in “What’s this article about?” field
User can change information in “Write your article (in markdown)?” field
User can remove already created tags from Article by click on them
